languages.text: "Там, снаружи, крики, что ли? Неужто на внутренний аванпост тоже напали? Это что ж, нигде не спастись от них?"

traits.locale_text: [Драфт] "Ваша светлость! Нам передали, что на внутренний аванпост тоже эти гады ползучие напали! Это что ж, нигде не спастись от них?"

languages.text: "What was that outside? Sounded like screaming. They can't have attacked a post this far in, can they? Is nowhere safe from them?"
languages.original_text: "Там, снаружи, крики, что ли? Неужто на внутренний аванпост тоже напали? Это что ж, нигде не спастись от них?"

traits.locale_text: "What was that outside? Sounded like screaming. They can't have attacked a post this far in, can they? Is nowhere safe from them?"
"What was that outside? Sounded like screaming. They can't have attacked a post this far in, can they? Is nowhere safe from them?"
"What was that outside? Sounded like screaming. They can't have attacked a post this far in, can they? Is nowhere safe from them?"
"What was that outside? Sounded like screaming. They can't have attacked a post this far in, can they? Is nowhere safe from them?"

languages.text: “外面是什么声音？听起来像是尖叫。他们不可能会袭击这么远的岗哨吧？难道无论躲到哪里，都躲不开他们的毒手吗？”
languages.original_text: "What was that outside? Sounded like screaming. They can't have attacked a post this far in, can they? Is nowhere safe from them?"

traits.locale_text: “外面是什么声音？听起来像是尖叫。他们不可能会袭击这么远的岗哨吧？难道无论躲到哪里，都躲不开他们的毒手吗？”

languages.text: «¿Qué ha sido ese ruido? Me ha parecido un grito. No han podido atacar una posición tan lejana, ¿no? ¿Es que ningún lugar está a salvo?».
languages.original_text: "What was that outside? Sounded like screaming. They can't have attacked a post this far in, can they? Is nowhere safe from them?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué ha sido ese ruido? Me ha parecido un grito. No han podido atacar una posición tan lejana, ¿no? ¿Es que ningún lugar está a salvo?».

languages.text: 「外の騒ぎは何だったんだ？悲鳴のようだったが。奴らはここまで奥まった拠点を攻撃したりするはず、ないよな？奴らの手が届かない安全な場所はどこにもないのか？」
languages.original_text: "What was that outside? Sounded like screaming. They can't have attacked a post this far in, can they? Is nowhere safe from them?"

traits.locale_text: 「外の騒ぎは何だったんだ？悲鳴のようだったが。奴らはここまで奥まった拠点を攻撃したりするはず、ないよな？奴らの手が届かない安全な場所はどこにもないのか？」

languages.text: « Qu'est-ce que c'était, dehors ? On aurait dit un cri. Ils n'auraient pas pu attaquer un avant-poste aussi reculé, si ? N'y a-t-il donc aucun lieu sûr ? »
languages.original_text: "What was that outside? Sounded like screaming. They can't have attacked a post this far in, can they? Is nowhere safe from them?"

traits.locale_text: « Qu'est-ce que c'était, dehors ? On aurait dit un cri. Ils n'auraient pas pu attaquer un avant-poste aussi reculé, si ? N'y a-t-il donc aucun lieu sûr ? »

languages.text: "Was war das draußen? Es klang wie Schreie. Sie können keinen Posten so weit im Inneren angreifen, oder? Ist es denn nirgends sicher?"
languages.original_text: "What was that outside? Sounded like screaming. They can't have attacked a post this far in, can they? Is nowhere safe from them?"

traits.locale_text: "Was war das draußen? Es klang wie Schreie. Sie können keinen Posten so weit im Inneren angreifen, oder? Ist es denn nirgends sicher?"

languages.text: "Dışarıda ne oldu? Çığlık atıldı sanki. Bu kadar içerideki bir mevkiye saldırmış olamazlar, değil mi? Hiçbir yerde onlardan korunamayacak mıyız?"
languages.original_text: "What was that outside? Sounded like screaming. They can't have attacked a post this far in, can they? Is nowhere safe from them?"

traits.locale_text: "Dışarıda ne oldu? Çığlık gibiydi. Bu kadar içerideki bir konuma saldırmış olamazlar, değil mi? Onlardan korunulabilecek hiçbir yer yok mu?"
